title: Phenomenological Approach to Building Instructor-Student Relationships in University Writing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Learners with basic digital platform proficiency but no PC ownership, learning through smartphones

learning_goals: Based on instructor feedback, learners can identify and articulate at least three personal challenges encountered during the writing process.
Through non-face-to-face interactions with instructors, learners can develop a concrete action plan for achieving writing goals.
Learners can practice at least two communication strategies necessary for building a trusting relationship with instructors on smartphone-based platforms.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
